content: pet bed by shawna hartfiel materials crochet hook size p / 11 5 mm removable stitch marker small medium large 13 across 5 high 15 across 5 5 high 17 across 6 high up to 8lb pet up to 14 lb pet up to 20 lb pet 170 yards each of 200 yards each of 250 yards each of 4 colours of worsted 4 colours of worsted 4 colours of worsted weight acrylic weight acrylic weight acrylic eyelash yarn eyelash yarn eyelash yarn total of 850 yards total of 1 000 yards total of 1 250 yards this is a great stash buster you crochet holding 5 strands together at once if you run out of one colour of yarn just join a new one in this will create a subtle striping effect i like to alternate different colours of eyelash yarn i used bernat boa for the beds in the pictures but any eyelash yarn will work gauge 2 stitches and 2 row per inch abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet instructions round 1 make 6 single_crochet using the magic_ring cast on method http //www crochetme com/dec_jan_0405/reads_round html or you can chain 2 single_crochet 6 times in second chain from hook you will be crocheting in a spiral you do not need to join your last stitch of each round to the first i find it easiest to put a removable stitch marker into the first stitch of each round so i don t lose my place 6 round 2 * 2 single_crochet in each stitch * around 12 round 3 * single_crochet
